title: Teen shot in head outside Tomball-area gas station
content:
HARRIS COUNTY, TEXAS - The Harris County Sheriff’s Office and Life Flight responded to a shooting outside a gas station southeast of Tomball.
The shooting happened around 10 p.m. Thursday on Boudreaux near Hufsmith-Khorville.
It’s believed a fight at another location carried over to the Valero gas station. Several males followed a young man, 17, to the station where someone shot him in the head.
Life Flight took the victim to the hospital in critical condition.
The suspects fled the scene.
Deputies would not comment on the shooting at the scene.
